SELECT DISTINCT m.movie_id, m.title, m.rating FROM movie m
JOIN schedule s ON s.movie_id = m.movie_id JOIN screen sc ON sc.screen_id = s.screen_id JOIN theater t ON t.theater_id = sc.theater_id
WHERE s.start_time >= SYSDATE
AND s.start_time >= TO_DATE(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND s.start_time < TO_DATE(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
AND t.region_no = #{region}
AND t.theater_id = #{theater}
ORDER BY m.title ASC

SELECT DISTINCT t.theater_name, t.theater_id, t.region_no FROM theater t
JOIN screen sc ON sc.theater_id = t.theater_id JOIN schedule s ON s.screen_id = sc.screen_id JOIN movie m ON m.movie_id = s.movie_id
WHERE s.start_time >= SYSDATE
AND s.start_time >= TO_DATE(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND s.start_time < TO_DATE(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
AND m.movie_id = #{movie}
ORDER BY t.theater_name ASC

SELECT m.title, m.movie_type, m.runtime, t.theater_name, sc.screen_name, s.schedule_id, TO_CHAR(s.start_time, 'HH24:MI') AS starttime, TO_CHAR(s.end_time, 'HH24:MI') AS endtime FROM schedule s
JOIN movie m ON m.movie_id = s.movie_id JOIN screen sc ON sc.screen_id = s.screen_id JOIN theater t ON sc.theater_id = t.theater_id LEFT JOIN schedule_seat ss ON s.schedule_id = ss.schedule_id
WHERE s.start_time >= SYSDATE
AND s.start_time >= TO_DATE(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND s.start_time < TO_DATE(#{date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
AND m.movie_id = #{movie}
AND t.theater_id = #{theater}
ORDER BY s.start_time ASC
